name: Escaping Scofield Mine
description:
"Escaping Scofield Mine" is a point-and-click adventure game. It's completely controlled by mouse, just click on the tile above where you want to go. It was made for the Ludum Dare #29 "Beneath the Surface". We feature some neat pixel art as well as a stunning soundtrack.

Our (@Laguna_999 and @Thunraz) tools of the trade are Visual Studio 2012/2013, Cubase 5, SFXR, Aseprite, AutoTileGen, TexturePacker, Tiled.
